name: Disco Loop
description:
DISCO LOOP 

 MOVE TO THE BEAT !!

You’re stuck in a loop, but not just any kind of loop : a musical loop !

Luckily, you are a born dancer.

Only one thing to do : move to the beat and escape from this cursed place..!

What is this game ? It’s a rhythmic game where you only can move to the beat. You have to push stuffs, avoid things, etc. It’s fun (and a bit hard). 

There are 7 levels to complete in order to beat (haha) the game.

CONTROLS :

Up/Down/Left/Right arrow to move

Press X to kill yourself and reset the level

Sorry for the absence of music,I did not have any remaining time, so it’s extremely annoying to just listen to the beat :( but it’s part of the all experience, right ? Oh, and it’s kinda diffcult too.

 Anyway. Hope you’ll enjoy.

Made for Ludum Dare #47

Made with PICO-8
